gobblin.hive.metastore

Class HiveMetaStoreUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.hive.metastore.HiveMetaStoreUtils

  • @Alpha
public class HiveMetaStoreUtils
extends Object
    A utility class for converting Hive's Table and Partition objects into Gobblin's HiveTable and HivePartition objects, and vice versa.
